testsuite.name: YamlDataSerializer Tests

testcase.name: serialize null list should throw exception
deserialize from non-existent file should return empty list
serialize empty list should create empty YAML array
serialize should save courses to YAML file
serialize and deserialize should preserve data integrity
deserialize should load courses from YAML file
